# haldru

With the help of authority numbers the R package `haldru` provides access to authority data of printers active in Halle (Saale) during the 16th, 17th and 18th centuries as well as to bibliographic data of their prints.

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("haldru/haldru")
```
## Documentation

```r
library(haldru)
data(package="haldru")
```
